mapper.select: SELECT no, subject, name, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, rcount, num FROM (SELECT no, subject, name, regdate, hit, rcount, rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(project_freeboard pf_no_pk)*/ no, subject, name, regdate, hit, rcount FROM project_freeboard)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_freeboard(no, name, subject, content, pwd) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1, 1) FROM project_freeboard), #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pwd})
mapper.select: SELECT pwd FROM project_freeboard WHERE no=#{no}
